source.b87f1796:
class Solution:
    def reverse(x):
        
        negative_flag = 1 if x < 0 else 0
        x = list(str(abs(x)))        
        x = int(''.join(x[::-1]))
        x *= -1 if negative_flag == 1 else 1
        
        return 0 if x < -pow(2, 31) or x > pow(2, 31) - 1 else x
source.fba91fd8:
class Solution:
    def reverse(x):
        
        negative_flag = 1 if x < 0 else 0
        x = list(str(abs(x)))        
        x = ''.join(x[::-1])

        import numpy as np

        x = np.array([x], dtype=np.int64)
        x *= -1 if negative_flag == 1 else 1
        
        return 0 if x[0] < -pow(2, 31) or x[0] > pow(2, 31) - 1 else x[0]
